channel.title: My Pocket Coach
channel.managingEditor: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.copyright: © Image Excellence Group - all rights reserved
channel.description:
My Pocket Coach is an online coaching platform to develop the personal impact power and all aspects of personal mastery, team effectiveness and organizational performance. We empower our clients to communicate with impact, manage impressions, influence, lead, and direct with distinction. These critical abilities produce powerful brand ambassadors who captivate the imagination and turn strategy into reality.

My pocket coach offers coaching tips and guidance that is scientifically-based, holistic and integrated, mobilising field experts to provide sustainable outcomes. Our team of multi-disciplinary specialists apply a unique methodology combining digital guidance, assessments, and online coaching to empower individuals.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Coaching Advice, Tips and Crisis Management
channel.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)

item.title: Who is My Pocket Coach? | Gail Cameron (IE Group | Managing Director)
item.itunes:title: Who is My Pocket Coach? | Gail Cameron (IE Group | Managing Director)
item.itunes:subtitle: Introduction of Coaching Modules
item.description:
In this episode Gail Cameron (The founder of My Pocket Coach and the Image Excellence Group) gives us insight into who is 'My Pocket Coach', what assessment tools are used, and an introduction to the various coaching modules.

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Strategic Image Management | Chivonne Jones (IE Group | Image Coach)
item.itunes:title: Strategic Image Management | Chivonne Jones (IE Group | Image Coach)
item.itunes:subtitle: Personal Mastery and Branding
item.description:
Perception is the only Reality others have; and their Perception is their Reality. > Strategic Image Management and Personal Branding. Our image management coaching focuses on Personal Branding and Image Excellence. Personal branding is the inner perspective one needs to know about who you are, Image Excellence is the outward reflection and embodiment thereof. Authenticity is magnetic, if we can make the connection between the highest expression of our Personal Brand and what it would look like in the world, we start to develop a unique value proposition that is underpinned by a high degree of self-awareness and confidence. To guide us on this journey we use a framework that covers important elements outlining how we can enhance our personal impact power including: - The Primacy Effect and its Criteria; - “Enclothed” Cognition Psychology; - Dress code for the work context; - The Science of colour; - Basic Body and Face shape Analysis; and - Accessories, grooming, make up, hairstyle. > What is Strategic Image Management? Strategic Image Management by its very definition suggests that you can and should manage the perceptions that others have of you. Perception is the only reality. Strategic Image Management is a composite issue forming part of a holistic approach towards the way in which you communicate. Everything about you speaks – your body language, appearance and your voice.

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
